overview:
Jodie Barr, President of OrderStorm, holds an Master of Science degree in Marketing from Colorado State University. She began marketing management for cloud services when they were in their infancy.

Prior to forming OrderStorm, Jodie worked for Qwest Cyber Solutions, one of the original ASPs (Application Service Provider) offering hosted SAP, Oracle and PeopleSoft. Her role was to guide product development for this high tech startup (a joint venture of Qwest and KPMG).

Jodie comes from a Fortune 500 background with past positions at Qwest, The Gates Corporation and Ogden
